headline.main: Obama Defends Black Lives Matter Movement
headline.print_headline: Obama Defends Black Lives Matter Movement

docs.snippet: Defending the Black Lives Matter movement, President Barack Obama said Thursday the protests are giving voice to a problem happening only in African-American communities, adding, "We, as a society, particularly given our history, have to take this...
docs.lead_paragraph: Defending the Black Lives Matter movement, President Barack Obama said Thursday the protests are giving voice to a problem happening only in African-American communities, adding, "We, as a society, particularly given our history, have to take this seriously."

headline.main: $6M Bond Set for Ohio Man Accused of Killing His 2 Sisters
headline.print_headline: $6M Bond Set for Ohio Man Accused of Killing His 2 Sisters

docs.snippet: A young man charged with fatally shooting his two teenage sisters and injuring a teenage boy as the trio sat in a minivan in the backyard of a suburban Cincinnati home is being held on bond of $6 million....
docs.lead_paragraph: A young man charged with fatally shooting his two teenage sisters and injuring a teenage boy as the trio sat in a minivan in the backyard of a suburban Cincinnati home is being held on bond of $6 million.

headline.main: U.S. House Members Push to Return North Korea to Terrorism List
headline.print_headline: U.S. House Members Push to Return North Korea to Terrorism List

docs.snippet: Members of the U.S. House of Representatives called on Thursday for the return of North Korea to Washington's list of "state sponsors of terrorism," subject to strict controls on trade and other restrictions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Members of the U.S. House of Representatives called on Thursday for the return of North Korea to Washington's list of "state sponsors of terrorism," subject to strict controls on trade and other restrictions.

headline.main: California Sets Path for Inmates to Get Sex-Reassignment Surgery
headline.print_headline: California Sets Path for Inmates to Get Sex-Reassignment Surgery

docs.snippet: Guidelines to decide whether transgender prison inmates in California can undergo sex reassignment surgery took effect Tuesday, making it the first U.S. state to offer a regular path to such treatment....
docs.lead_paragraph: Guidelines to decide whether transgender prison inmates in California can undergo sex reassignment surgery took effect Tuesday, making it the first U.S. state to offer a regular path to such treatment.

headline.main: FDA Warns of Deadly Liver Damage With AbbVie Hepatitis Drugs
headline.print_headline: FDA Warns of Deadly Liver Damage With AbbVie Hepatitis Drugs

docs.snippet: Federal health officials are warning doctors and patients that two hepatitis C drugs from AbbVie can cause life-threatening liver injury in patients with advanced forms of the disease....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal health officials are warning doctors and patients that two hepatitis C drugs from AbbVie can cause life-threatening liver injury in patients with advanced forms of the disease.

headline.main: Ballerina’s Tale Continues: Misty Copeland Developing TV Series

docs.snippet: Misty Copeland and Tracy Oliver, of “The Misadventures of Awkward Black Girl,” are developing a drama about the dance world for 20th Century Fox Television....
docs.abstract: Misty Copeland and Tracy Oliver, of “The Misadventures of Awkward Black Girl,” are developing a drama about the dance world for 20th Century Fox Television.

headline.main: Regulators Slash Telephone Call Rates for Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Regulators Slash Telephone Call Rates for Prisoners

docs.snippet: The Federal Communications Commission on Thursday slashed U.S. prison telephone rates for local and long-distance calls to 11 cents a minute, from levels as high as $14 a minute....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Federal Communications Commission on Thursday slashed U.S. prison telephone rates for local and long-distance calls to 11 cents a minute, from levels as high as $14 a minute.
